# decorator

The `llm.agent` decorator for turning a function into an agent.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/decorator/index" symbolName="Context" /> Context

Context for LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/decorator/index" symbolName="Client" /> Client

The base interface for LLM clients.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/decorator/index" symbolName="Params" /> Params

The base interface for LLM parameters.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/decorator/index" symbolName="ContextToolDef" /> ContextToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/decorator/index" symbolName="ToolDef" /> ToolDef

Protocol defining a tool that can be used by LLMs.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/decorator/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/decorator/index" symbolName="Agent" /> Agent

Agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/decorator/index" symbolName="AsyncAgent" /> AsyncAgent

Asynchronous agent class for generating responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/decorator/index" symbolName="AsyncStructuredAgent" /> AsyncStructuredAgent

Asynchronous structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="agents/decorator/index" symbolName="StructuredAgent" /> StructuredAgent

Structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.
